A Few Words About Us

About Arcelo
Nutri Foods

Arcelo Nutrifood is committed to providing Delicious, Nutritious, 100% Plant-based Foods that are completely Natural and cater to the nutritious needs to people across ages. <br>

As a company, we focus on delivering unique differentiated flavors that make eating nutritious/healthy food a joyous experience (We believe that nutritious/healthy food can, and must taste delicious !)

When it comes to natural peanut butter, Arcelo is my first preference. The taste is perfect, it is just like eating peanuts. No added sugars, oils, preservatives. I recommend to give it a try.
Kishan -
Good product and taste. A bit on the thinner side as far as consistency is concerned but Will certainly buy again as am overall satisfied.
Parth -
Excellent product! I have tried every brand and this is wonderful, great taste clean ingredients and nice texture to spread or drizzle. Highly recommend
Shruti -
So happy with the product. It doesn’t disappoint. Results are better plus it’s so delicious that I finish 1 kg in just 15-20 days. Totally worth it. You can make lot of healthy smoothies using it. Plus for boosting your protein intake, add one spoon into whey protein. Totally nailed it. Thanks Arcelo!
Jyoti -
Very good product, Natural taste moderate and loved the crunchy one Go for it
Khyati -

Why Choose Us

What makes us different

As we explore new products and try to create more with our brand, we know we will never compromise on these three things:

NO GOOGLING

If you have to Google an ingredient, chances are they aren’t natural foods. Chances are that they are artificial preservatives or emulsifiers that we know very little about. When you make something for your family you know exactly what you put in it. That’s the way we make our products too.

ALLERGIES BEING TAKEN SERIOUSLY

We are parents ourselves and we know how a food allergy or food choice can affect the health and everyday life of your child or loved one. That’s why we created a line of products that declare every little ingredient. We are Dairy-free, Gluten-free, Soy-free and all Vegan !

WHOLESOME NUTRITION

We combine high quality ingredients to provide products that are rich in macro and micro-nutrients as well and flavour. We use nature’s most nutritious gifts : nuts, seeds, legumes, millets and other plant based ingredients to provide you wholesome nutrition.
